Pre-Game Insights: Klay Thompson parted ways with the Golden State Warriors and was replaced by Buddy Hield.
The Golden State Warriors have a clear game plan and much of their championship core remains intact.
The Portland Trail Blazers lost all four matches against the Golden State Warriors in the previous season.
Stephen Curry will play after resting in the final pre-season game.
Deandre Ayton has cemented his position as the next 'big man' in the league since moving to Portland.
Anfernee Simons is developing into a scoring 'juggernaut' for the Portland Trail Blazers.
